144008.「ずっと こんなところに\n 閉じこめられてたんだね……。\n 今まで 気付かな:
You've been trapped in this place all along...
I'm sorry that we didn't realize until now...

144009.「私たち 思いだしました。 \n 虚無の邪神の先兵と\n 戦っていたときのことを:
We remembered...we remembered the time when
we fought against the vanguard of the Dark
Deity of Nihility...

144010.「とても 厳しい戦いでした……。\n どれだけ 時間がたったのか\n わからなく:
What an incredibly harsh battle it was...
So much time had passed that we completely
lost track...

144011.「そんな中 あなたは 私たちの盾となり \n 封魔フォーゲルが放った 魔法から\:
But amidst everything, you became our shield
and protected us from Vogel's magic...

144012.「……そう あれは 虚無の魔法……\n そのせいで 私たちは あなたのことを\n:
Yes, that nihilistic magic...
Because of its power, we had forgotten all
about you.

144013.「私たちを 守ってくれたのに\n 助けてあげられなくて……\n 本当に ごめんな:
I'm so sorry...
Even though you were our shield, we
couldn't save you...

144014.「皆の盾となるのが 私の役目ですから。\n あなたたちと同じように 自分の役目を:
My role is to be a shield for all.
I was simply just doing my part, just like
all of you were.

144015.「……ほら もう そんな顔はやめて。 \n こうしてまた 皆で 再会できたのに\:
Look, stop making that kind of face. It's a
shame for you to be crying when we're all
reunited like this!

144017.「……それにしても メナーたちにさえ\n 届かなかった 私の声が聞こえたなんて\:
But still, to hear my voice that even Menna
and the others couldn't reach, you are indeed
a fighter who has gathered three hearts.

144018.「さあ <pc>のさらなる 成長のために\n 光の導きのもと チカラの解放を\n:
Let's release our power under the guidance of
the light for the further growth of
<pc>.

144019.「我が名は 光導使ミナナ……\n 我らが主 聖光教主と 交わせし誓いのもと\n:
I am Minana, one of the Light Guides....
Under the oath exchanged with my master,
the Light Lord, I am here to guide you.

144020.「深遠なる意思に導かれ 紡がれし光芒。 \n 幾千もの光芒集いて 束になれば\n:
A woven radiance, guided by a profound will. When thousands of these radiances gather and unite as one, they inevitably become a
divine light.

144021.「聖光よ その大いなる輝きをもって\n この混迷の世界に あまねく降り注ぐ\n:
O divine light, with your great radiance...
Shower your rays of hope upon this
turmoiled world!

144022.「……それでは\n 希望の紋章を 高く かかげてください。: Please hold high the Crest of Hope.

144023.<pc>は 希望の紋章を空高く かかげた。: <pc> holds the Crest of Hope high.

144024.「今 聖光を紡ぎし \n 闘戦士 <pc>の 希望のチカラを捧げ\n 次なる道を:
And now, offering the power of hope that
has been woven by the divine light...
Reveal thy path forward!

144025.「さあ これでチカラの解放は おわりました。 \n すぐに 新しい自分を 実感で:
Now, the release of your power is complete.
You will soon experience a new you.

144026.「これで 今度こそ 聖光教主さまに\n 会う準備が ととのったってわけね！: So now we are all ready to meet Light Lord!

144027.「ついに 会えるんだー！\n あーん！ どうしよう！: We're finally going to meet! Aah! Oh, my God!

144028.「いつぶりでしょうか……\n 楽しみですね。:
I wonder for how long... I'm looking forward
to it

144030.「みんな 落ち着いて。\n 今すぐに 会えるわけじゃないんですよ。: Everyone, calm down. We can't meet right now.

144031.「さあ もう 持ち場に戻って\n ひとりでも多くの 闘戦士を導きましょう。:
Now it's time to get back to work and lead as
many fighters as possible.

144034.「さあ これでチカラの解放は おわりました。 \n ……あら？ あなたは すでに:
Now, the release of power is complete. Oh? You
have already released the level restrictions.

144035.「レベル制限を解放できるのは 一度だけ。 \n 代わりに これを差し上げましょう:
You can only release the level limit once.
Instead, I give you this.
